crypto.name: PQ
crypto.desc: Sup! I have a warm-up exercise for you. Test yourself!

crypto.name: QR
crypto.desc: Try to see an order in these pixels.

crypto.name: Single R
crypto.desc: This curve is too strange. Care to take a look?

misc.name: Zeliard Tales
misc.desc: Uncover the secrets of the world of Zeliard and save Felicia!

pwn.name: Ponatural Selection
pwn.desc: Millions of years of evolution, dominating all living things, building infrastructure and regulation is cool, but can the pinnacle of it all pass the simple task of a simple dude from the slums?

rev.name: Tridea
rev.desc:
There's a PNG file encrypted with a strangely-named utility tridea.

Could you please decrypt it?

rev.name: cuCRACKME
rev.desc:
Guess not even lava could crack this one...

Can you?
